column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If you're looking for a fun place to go on a date or with some girlfriends
column2: cafe ba-ba-reeba is the place to go. The atmosphere is warm and inviting
column3: and the food is delish. Plus
column5: it doesn't get any better than this. They have 6 different sangrias on tap
column6: and they always have a seasonal special. If you are lucky enough to get the pomegranate sangria on special
